alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Jefferson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jefferson and south central Dodge Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Johnson Creek, or near Watertown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45-50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Lake Mills, Johnson Creek, Ixonia, Milford, Pipersville, Hubbleton, and Lake Lac La Belle. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 between mile markers 260 and 278. Wisconsin Highway 26 between mile markers 31 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
